message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100.  Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $115.
